titleStmt.title: A perfect, safe and private cure for a clap, pain, heat, scalding in making water, running, &c. in a few days; and in 4 or 5 weeks time for the French disease ...

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Items at reel positions E8:2[69] and E8:2[221]), are faded towards the foot.
